attributes.action: Enforce social distancing measures to stop Covid19 spread as per WHO guidelines
attributes.additional_details: The virus curve must be flattened so that people don't die. A good reference for why social distancing is necessary to flatten this curve and potentially how it can stop a huge loss of life and how it has affected other countries can be found here https://medium.com/@tomaspueyo/coronavirus-act-today-or-people-will-die-f4d3d9cd99ca, written by Tomas Pueyo.
attributes.background: The UK is the only Covid19 infected country going for the 'herd immunity' response, against WHO guidelines. This could result in millions of people dying. Other countries, especially China have shown that taking drastic social distancing measures can work to reduce the spread of the virus.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government have announced new measures. You can read up to date information here: 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public  

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to do something further, or you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301397

Please remember to include your full name if you do start a new petition.
